DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : ONETIME CHARGE RESULTS IN FORTUNE PETROLEUM LOSS
DOC.TEXT: Fortune Petroleum Corp . in Agoura Hills said it will take a onetime special charge of $ 1.9 million in the fourth quarter to reflect lower oil prices , resulting in a significant loss for its just-completed fiscal_year . Fortune Petroleum , an independent oil and gas exploration and production company , said it did not want to spread_out the effect of the lower oil prices experienced in 1993 over the next several years . By taking the onetime charge , the company said its earnings will be higher in 1994 and in the future .
